programmes.show_description: Military thriller based on true events. A group of US Navy Seals find themselves on the mission of a lifetime when the top-secret target they've been assigned turns out to be Osama bin Laden. (2012)
Action thriller with Henry Cavill. A police officer and a vigilante are caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a troubled, recently-arrested man who is linked to years of female abductions. (2018)
Tentacled terror starring horror icon Peter Cushing. Following a spate of grisly deaths, a scientist travels to a remote island where he discovers deadly tentacled monsters are taking over. (1966)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Malone's dream of successfully returning to his wonderful life and beautiful fiance in London suddenly and mysteriously appears to come true. S2, Ep7/22
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Western adventure sequel with Kenny Rogers. Brady Hawkes sets out to find his son, who is on the run with outlaws Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Ep2

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. CD, Trivette, and Walker stumble on a drug operation while on a fishing trip. S2, Ep7/25
Disaster drama. When a global scientific summit fails to stop an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, a young tech genius assembles her own team of specialists to stop the impending disaster. (2020)

After a mystery woman tells Veronica that her parents are alive, she unwittingly releases a savage giant from captivity and Marguerite and the others must subdue him again. S2, Ep8/22
Colt helps a homeless person who witnessed a judge's murder. However, events take a turn when he is injured and recalls his true identity. S2, Ep13
Vietnam War adventure with Danny Glover. A bomber pilot disillusioned by military hierarchy finds an ally in a veteran bombardier, and they launch an attack on an anti-aircraft missile site. (1990)
Gritty crime drama with Danny Dyer. A criminal flees London in the 1980s and joins the inner circle of a British gangster living in exile on the Costa del Sol.

Thriller with Benicio Del Toro. A woman paid $1million to carry the child of a gangster is abducted by two crooks, who soon discover what lengths the crook will go to ensure her safe return. (2000)
